mapper.sql: sd.seqno, sd.TRANS_SPOT, sd.STCR, sd.SDGR, sd.TKMS, sd.SSDS, sd.INSERT_ORGAN_ID, sd.INSERT_OPER, sd.INSERT_TIME, sd.STATUS, sd.REPORT_TIME, sd.REPORT_ID, sd.SSCAT, sd.CONDITION_CODE, sd.EXPLICATION,sd.FIRST_ID, sd.FIRST_END_TIME, sd.SECOND_ID, sd.SECOND_END_TIME, sd.FINAL_ID, sd.FINAL_END_TIME, sd.APPROVE_FINISH_ID, sd.APPROVE_FINISH_TIME, sd.POLICY_TYPE, sd.CTID, sd.CRNM, sd.CRIT, sd.CRID, sd.APPROVE_ID, sd.APPROVE_TIME, sd.AGREE_SUGGESTION, sd.FIRST_INSPECT_OPERATE, sd.SECOND_INSPECT_OPERATE, sd.APPROVE_OPERATE, REVIEW, sd.ENTER_AUDIT_TIME, sct.POLICY_NO, scm.CUSTOMER_NAME, scm.CUSTOMER_ID
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sus_data sd LEFT JOIN sus_customer scm ON sd.seqno = scm.su_data_id LEFT JOIN sus_contract sct ON sd.seqno = sct.su_data_id WHERE sd.seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update sus_data set TRANS_SPOT = #{transSpot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STCR = #{stcr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDGR = #{sdgr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TKMS = #{tkms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSDS = #{ssds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SSCAT = #{sscat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where sd.seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
